hypothesis_content.title: Bear-to-Neutral Transition via Positive Divergence in On-Chain Accumulation
hypothesis_content.statement: During a BEAR regime, if the 30-day net position change of entities holding >1K BTC turns positive (accumulation) for 3 consecutive days while price makes a lower low, a long position entered at the daily close will profit as the regime transitions to NEUTRAL within 15 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Smart money (large holders) often accumulates during fear-driven sell-offs in bear markets. A divergence between price (lower low) and their net accumulation (turning positive) signals weakening selling pressure and potential regime transition foundation. The Mayer Multiple filter ensures we are in a historically undervalued zone.
entry_conditions: 30-day net position change of 'Whales' (>1K BTC entities) > 0 for 3 consecutive days (Glassnode/Coin Metrics)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime changes to NEUTRAL (confidence > 0.5%) OR 18% profit
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price makes a new 20-day low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Price continues to make lower lows for >15 days after signal despite whale accumulation, indicating the regime is stronger than the smart money signal.
